summary: Hunting Bow with Sights - Designed to play without Hud-Crosshair
descriptionHtml:
[color=Lightgrey][center][b]<-------<< Sighted Hunting Bow >>------->[/b]

[b]The Sighted Hunting Bow is a Bow Weapon with Sights - Designed to play without HUD-Crosshair[/b]

[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/37298-1-1390647983.jpg[/img]

[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/37298-2-1390647984.jpg[/img]

[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/37298-3-1390647984.jpg[/img][/center]

[b]<-------<< [/color][color=gold]INSTALLL-UNISTALL[/color][color=Lightgrey] >>------->[/b]

NEXUS MOD MANAGER (Recommended):

[u]Install[/u]
1.)Download and install the "Sighted Hunting Bow" main file
2.)Play and have Fun!

======= ======= =======

Folder Structure looks like this:

data/meshes/weapons/sniper sight bows/Hunting/...-here are the textures
data/textures/weapons/sniper sight bows/hunting/....-here are the textures


[u]Manual UNINSTALL:[/u]
Just remove the Files.




[b]<-------<< [/color][color=gold]How To Get In Game[/color][color=Lightgrey] >>------->[/b]

[u]Crafting:[/u] This is a fully craftable weapon

[u]Cheating (Console Comand):[/u]
open the console with ^
1.)type: [b]help sighted[/b] it will show up with it's id
2.)type: [b]player.additem xxxxxxxx 1[/b] (instead of x type the numbers of the id - the 1 at the end stands for the number of bows that you will get)



[b]<-------<< [/color][color=gold]RECOMMENDATIONS[/color][color=Lightgrey] >>------->[/b]

[u]MODS:[/u]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11941/?]ABT - Arrows and Bolts Tweaks[/url]
+DISABLE the HUD completely (this is how i play) or instead use one or both of the suggested mods below.


[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3222/?]Immersive Hud[/url]
To turn crosshair and/or sneak eye off (this mod offers many great options)

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26387/?]Simple Crosshair[/url]
To move the sneak eye down on your screen between health and magica bar download "oblivion style sneak eye" (works great in combination with iHud)

<-------<< >>------->

[u]SKYRIM.INI TWEAKS[/u](make a backup at first!)

[Combat]
fMagnetismStrafeHeadingMult=0.0
fMagnetismLookingMult=0.0
f1PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.7
f3PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.7

[Actor]
fVisibleNavmeshMoveDist=12288.0000
